name: Playing History - The Plague
description: Go on an exciting journey in the 14th century of Florence, an amazing city struck by a mysterious disease. The story is brimming with fascinating characters, historical events and captivating locations. History is yours to explore.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics / 512MB VRAM Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: 'The Plague didn't kill me, even if I wanted it'
Fun little RPG game with a good educative content. Well worth its price
